current.description: This array describes the current situation at airport queues

queueId.description: Unique ID of queue at your airport

queueName.description: Name of the queue, e.g. Security Check at Terminal 2

projectedWaitTime.description: Average waiting time in seconds at the given queue.

projectedMinWaitTime.description: Minimum waiting time in seconds at the given queue.

projectedMaxWaitTime.description: Maximum waiting time in seconds at the given queue.

time.description: Timestamp of the delivered current waiting times situation. Format ISO-8601 is used including time zone.

forecast.description: This array gives an estimation / forecast for the waiting time at airport queues at specific times (e.g. every 15 min for the next 4 hours, every 1 hr for the next day)

queueId.description: Unique ID of queue at your airport

queueName.description: Name of the queue, e.g. Security Check at Terminal 2

projectedWaitTime.description: Average estimated/forecasted (based on historical data and flight plan information) waiting time in seconds at the given queue.

confidence.description: How accurate is the given projection? This percentage increases based on the data quality and quantity.

time.description: Time of projection for waiting times. Format ISO-8601 is used including time zone.
